title: Please provide compressed Rar game file
body:
Well i am trying to download the LOL game file for last three days, i always download the file around 12 to 15% and when i start to downloading the game file again on next day it always start from 0%. And the downloading speed was very poor like 25 to 40 kbps. But when i download the other files from net downloading speed is like 1 to 4 mbps. What is the problem i can not able to figure it out. 
So please riot provide the compressed rar/torrent game file. 
Thanks

Nshera (NA)

replies.body: The patcher needs to check your game files to apply updates and launch properly.  If you're getting a patch notification each time, then something could be preventing it from saving.  This can happen if you installed league outside of your primary internal drive, or a security setting.  My suggestion here would be to start off by going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League has proper permissions to read and update your game files.  Let me know if that does the trick!
